:root {
  --primary: #0057b7;
  --found: #28a745;
  --lost: #dc3545;
  --bg: #f2f4f8;
  --card-bg: #fff;
  --text: #333;
}


body {
 background-image: url("data:image/jpeg;base64,");
 background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  min-height: 100vh;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}


header {
  background: #111;
  color: rgb(244, 241, 241);
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: right;
  font-size: 25px;
  padding: 15px 40px;
}

.logo {
  font-size: 1.5em;
  font-weight: bold;
}

nav a {
  color: white;
  margin: 0 10px;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 500;
  text-align: right;
}

.login-btn {
  background: transparent;
  border: 1px solid white;
  padding: 6px 12px;
  color: white;
  border-radius: 6px;
  font-size: 25px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.search-bar {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 20px;
  gap: 10px;
}

.search-bar input {
  width: 40%;
  padding: 12px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 20px;;
}

.search-bar button {
  padding: 12px 18px;
  background: sky blueviolet;
  color: rgb(117, 206, 66);
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  cursor: pointer;
}


.filters {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 10px;
  margin: 10px auto;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.filters button,
.filters select {
  padding: 10px 16px;
  font-size: 14px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  border: 1px solid #dc2d2d;
  background-color: #2f87da;
  font-size: 20px;
  color: #f7f5f5;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.filters button:hover,
.filters select:hover {
  background-color: #290bad;
}


.grid-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(320px, 1fr));
  gap: 30px;
  padding: 40px;
}



.card {
  background-color: var(--card-bg);
  border-radius: 12px;
  overflow: visible;
  
  background-color: #faf3f3;
  box-shadow: 0 8px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
  transition: transform 0.3s;
}

.card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.card img {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto; /* Let it scale proportionally */
  object-fit: cover; /* Makes it look neat without distortion */
  border-top-left-radius: 10px;
  border-top-right-radius: 10px;
  max-height: 400px; /* Optional: cap height */
}


.card-body {
  padding: 20px;

font-size: 30px;

}

.card-body h2 {
  margin: 0 0 10px;
  font-size: 35px;
}
.category-tag {
  background-color: hsl(0, 20%, 98%);
  color: rgb(16, 16, 16);
  padding: 3px 10px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  font-size: 25px;
  margin-left: 5px;
}


.badge {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 6px 12px;
  font-size: 20px;
  border-radius: 20px;
  margin-top: 10px;
  color: white;
}

.found-badge {
  background-color: var(--found);
  display: block;            /* Make it take up space */
  margin: 10px auto;         /* Center it horizontally */
  width: 90px;        /* Adjust width to content, or set fixed width below */
  padding: 6px 20px;         /* Increase horizontal size */
  font-size: 20px;
  text-align: center;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-weight: 700;
}


.lost-badge {
  background-color: var(--lost);
    display: block;            /* Make it take up space */
  margin: 10px auto;         /* Center it horizontally */
  width: 90px;        /* Adjust width to content, or set fixed width below */
  padding: 6px 20px;         /* Increase horizontal size */
  font-size: 20px;
  text-align: center;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
  
}

.card-actions {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: flex-start;
  align-items: center;
  margin-top: 15px;
}


.btn {
  padding: 8px 14px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
  cursor: pointer;
  margin-right: 10px;
}

.edit {
  background-color: #ffc107;
  color: #000;
  font-size: 20px;
}

.delete {
  background-color: var(--lost);
  color: white;
  margin-left: auto; 
  font-size: 20px;
}


.add-btn {
  margin: 30px auto;
  display: block;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background-color: #007bff;
  color: white;
  font-size: 20px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.dropdown {
  position: absolute;
  top: 100%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  margin-top: 10px;
  background-color: white;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
  padding: 10px 0;
  width: 200px;
  text-align: center;
  z-index: 999;
}

.dropdown a {
  display: block;
  padding: 10px 15px;
  color: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: background 0.3s;
}

.dropdown a:hover {
  background-color: #f0f0f0;
}

.hidden {
  display: none;
}
/* Modal Background */
.modal {
  display: none;
  position: fixed;
  z-index: 999;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

/* Modal Content */
.modal-content {
  background: #fff;
  margin: 8% auto;
  padding: 30px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  width: 90%;
  max-width: 500px;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  position: relative;
}

/* Close Button */
.close {
  position: absolute;
  top: 10px;
  right: 20px;
  color: #444;
  font-size: 30px;
  font-weight: bold;
  cursor: pointer;
}

/* Form Styles */
#itemForm {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 15px;
}

#itemForm input,
#itemForm select,
#itemForm textarea {
  padding: 10px;
  font-size: 20px;
  border-radius: 6px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
}

#itemForm textarea {
  resize: vertical;
}

.submit-btn {
  padding: 12px;
  background-color: #007bff;
  color: white;
  font-size: 20px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background 0.3s;
}

.submit-btn:hover {
  background-color: #0056b3;
}  
lost.js
function searchItems() {
  const query = document.getElementById("searchInput").value.toLowerCase();
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll(".card");

  cards.forEach(card => {
    const name = card.getAttribute("data-name");
    const location = card.getAttribute("data-location");

    if (name.includes(query) || location.includes(query)) {
      card.style.display = "block";
    } else {
      card.style.display = "none";
    }
  });
}
function filterStatus(status) {
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll(".card");
  cards.forEach(card => {
    const isFound = card.classList.contains("found");
    const isLost = card.classList.contains("lost");

    if (
      status === "all" ||
      (status === "found" && isFound) ||
      (status === "lost" && isLost)
    ) {
      card.style.display = "block";
    } else {
      card.style.display = "none";
    }
  });
}

function filterCategory() {
  const selected = document.getElementById("categoryFilter").value;
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll(".card");

  cards.forEach(card => {
    const category = card.getAttribute("data-category");
    if (selected === "all" || selected === category) {
      card.style.display = "block";
    } else {
      card.style.display = "none";
    }
  });
}
function login() {
  window.location.href = "dashlost1.html";
}
function register() {
  window.location.href = "dashlost2.html";
}
function toggleDropdown() {
  const dropdown = document.getElementById("dropdown-menu");
  dropdown.classList.toggle("hidden");
}

function addItem(type) {
  alert("You clicked to add a " + type + " item!");
  // You can redirect or open a form modal here
  // Example: window.location.href = `add.html?type=${type}`;
}
function openModal() {
  document.getElementById("itemModal").style.display = "block";
}

function closeModal() {
  document.getElementById("itemModal").style.display = "none";
}

// Optional: Close modal when clicking outside the content
window.onclick = function (event) {
  const modal = document.getElementById("itemModal");
  if (event.target == modal) {
    modal.style.display = "none";
  }
};
